#### North Region

```{r}

# Set Parameter values 
r <- 0.025
K <- 448
N0 <- 140
nyears <- 25

# Define functions
logistic <- function(r, K, nt) {
  ntplus1 <- nt + r * nt * (1 -nt /K)
  return(ntplus1)
}

# Create a loop to run the logistic model

nt <- rep(NA, nyears) 
nt[1] <- N0

for (i in 2:nyears) {
  nt[i] <- logistic(r = r,
                    K = K,
                    nt = nt[i - 1])
}


# Run Scenario 1: North 
# nominal case parameters
r <- mean(0.025, 0.049)
K <- 448
N0 <- 140

output <- logistic_pop(r = r,
                       K = K,
                       N0 = N0,
                       nyears = nyears)

# calculate % change
100 * (output[ nyears ] - output[ 1 ]) / output[ 1 ]
```
